mapper.select: select pt.type as kpi_type,pt.points_make as kpi,pt.points,tt.reason,tt.dept_points,tt.staff_id,tt.staff_name,tt.dept_id as dept_id from (select * from edu_points_type where type in ('德','勤','能','绩') ) pt LEFT JOIN (select * from (select p.remark as reason,p.points as dept_points,s.sys_id as staff_id,s.`name` as staff_name ,p.points_type_id,s.dept_id from edu_points p left join edu_staff s on s.sys_id = p.tea_id and p.add_time between #{addTime} and #{andTime} ) t where t.staff_id = #{staffId}) tt on tt.points_type_id=pt.sys_id and pt.type in ('德','勤','能','绩') order by pt.create_time asc
mapper.update: update kpi_notes set update_time = now() where sys_id = #{sysId}
